hook.text: A petition with 100,000 signatures demands policy change. But 90,000 signatures came from the same IP addresses.

buildup.text: Astroturfing creates the illusion of organic public support using manufactured data.

discovery.text: Named for artificial grass, astroturfing simulates grassroots movements to influence public opinion and policy.

climax.text: Detecting astroturfing requires checking data provenance: where did these numbers actually come from?

quiz.question: What is astroturfing?
options: Creating fake grassroots support using manufactured data and bots
